title: Please don't play GP in ranked unless you are a god on him.
body:
Look I know, op.gg says hes got the highest winrate top. 
But unless you can do a basic barrel combo please don't play him top.

replies.body: Their rank will reflect their skill with their picks. It's fine.

> [{quoted}](name=Maximum Morde,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6o13jKue,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-19T22:19:20.492+0000)
>
> Their rank will reflect their skill with their picks. It's fine.

Yah but its hurts other people.

So what you're telling people is.... play him mid instead 

{{summoner:13}}
